title: A1708 820-00840 no power
message:
Hi.

I have an A1708 820-00840 that has 20V from ampmeter, but 0A.

PPBUS_G3H seams to be shorted, but I can't see nothing hot (injected 1.5V).

PPBUS_G3H  = 0V
Diode reading on PPBUS_G3H = 0.002

Can you help?

title: A1708 820-00840 no power
message:
Check (ohm scale) if you get same reading on any big coil.
Use 10-20A PSU, setting amp limit to max first.

title: A1708 820-00840 no power
message:
Hi,

I don't have a 10A PSU. But with my 5A PSU it only gets around 2A of consume with 1.5V injected

title: A1708 820-00840 no power
message:
Did you set amp limit to max?
Even 3W should heat something on the board.
Use powerful cables; your interest is not heating the cables.
An IR cam may help you to find the culprit.

title: A1708 820-00840 no power
message:
Hi,
Yes, I set the amp limit to max (5A), and I already use the thermal cam, but I can't see nothing hot.

With the amp limit to 5A, injecting 1.5V, only consumes around 2A. 

Shall I increase the voltage*?

title: A1708 820-00840 no power
message: Be sure first the short doesn't come from a secondary coil!!!
